# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(60, -60)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner-mining-drill
- Ensure that the burner-mining-drill has fuel before attempting to mine.
### Errors when using stone-furnace
- Ensure that the stone-furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to smelt.
### Errors when using burner-inserter
- Ensure that the burner-inserter has the required items to insert before attempting to insert.
### Errors when using offshore-pump
- Ensure that the offshore-pump is placed in a valid position before attempting to pump.
### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to heat.
### Errors when using steam-engine
- Ensure that the steam-engine is connected to a valid power source before attempting to generate power.
### Errors when using pipe-group
- Ensure that the pipe-group is connected to a valid fluid source before attempting to transport fluid.
### Errors when using electricity-group
- Ensure that the electricity-group is connected to a valid power source before attempting to generate power.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* entity positions (x, y)
* entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WORKING)
* entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace)
